content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the number of steps in the route is doubled, the distance from the starting point to the endpoint should also be doubled.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a shipwreck. Moving in a clockwise direction from the shipwreck, the elements on the path are a red king crab, an ear, a monastery, a baboon, a hare, a convertible, an altar, an infant bed, a washing machine, a ladle, a chimpanzee, a maraca, a motorboat, a custard apple, a sea urchin, a brain coral, a beer bottle, a goldfish, and an Alpine ibex. Starting from the goldfish, you move around the ring by 16 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 4 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

I have moved 16 steps in a clockwise direction from the goldfish.

So I move along the path in this order: 

Goldfish -> King Crab -> Ear -> Monastery -> Baboon -> Hare -> Convertible -> Altar -> Infant Bed -> Washing Machine -> Ladle -> Chimpanzee -> Maraca -> Motorboat -> Custard Apple -> Sea Urchin -> Brain Coral -> Beer Bottle.

And after this I will move in the opposite direction (counter-clockwise) 4 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Ladle.

Now, I move again in the opposite direction (counter-clockwise) 13 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Beer Bottle.

Finally, I move again in the same direction (clockwise) 4 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Alpine Ibex.

And I find an Alpine Ibex on the circular map.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a shipwreck. Moving in a clockwise direction from the shipwreck, the elements on the path are a red king crab, an ear, a monastery, a baboon, a hare, a convertible, an altar, an infant bed, a washing machine, a ladle, a chimpanzee, a maraca, a motorboat, a custard apple, a sea urchin, a brain coral, a beer bottle, a goldfish, and an Alpine ibex. Starting from the goldfish, you move around the ring by 32 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 26 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

I have moved 32 steps in a clockwise direction from the goldfish.

So I move along the path in this order: 

Goldfish -> King Crab -> Ear -> Monastery -> Baboon -> Hare -> Convertible -> Altar -> Beetle -> Infant Bed -> Washing Machine -> Sculpture -> Chimpanzee -> Ladder -> Motorboat -> Mango -> Sea Urchin -> Flowerpot -> Brain Coral -> Suitcase -> Beer Bottle.

And after this I will move in the opposite direction (counter-clockwise) 8 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Suitcase.

Now, I move again in the same direction (counter-clockwise) 26 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Beer Bottle.

Finally, I move again in the opposite direction (clockwise) 8 steps. So, I will be standing at the position of the Suitcase.

And I find a beer bottle on the circular map.
